about_the_game:
Game Title: ETERNAL PUPPET

Description:

Get ready to immerse yourself in a world of psychological horror in ETERNAL PUPPET! In this game, you will become a worker hired by a package delivery company, tasked with completing pending tasks and keeping the warehouse safe during the dangerous nights.

But be careful, for the shadows of the warehouse harbor dark and disturbing secrets. As you venture into the depths of the place, you will face a combination of unsettling events, some of mundane origin, such as sudden blackouts, and others, entirely paranormal.

The tension increases with each task and completed night shift, while you face your worst nightmares and an enigmatic mannequin that seems to have a life of its own. Will you be able to maintain your sanity while struggling to survive?

Key Features:
• Experience immersive horror in an atmospheric and detailed environment, where the line between reality and nightmare blurs.
• Psychological Terror: Prepare for an experience that will keep you on edge, challenging your nerves and sanity at every turn.
• Realistic Aesthetics: Carefully designed graphics and objects will immerse you in a world that feels as real as it is terrifying.
• Gameplay: This game is primarily a "walking simulator," but with the added feature of interacting with objects.
• Face a variety of paranormal and mundane events as you struggle to survive.
• Complete tasks in a perilous environment.
• Autosave: Don't worry about losing your progress, each level has strategic save points.
• The game offers different languages that you can change (Translation errors may occur).
• Allows you to customize the graphics to your liking.
• Thanks to the Unreal Engine 5, both the lighting and the environment offer an experience almost true to reality.

Prepare for an experience that will challenge your nerves and keep you on edge until the last moment. Do you have what it takes to face your fears? Discover it in ETERNAL PUPPET.

Description:

But be careful, for the shadows of the warehouse harbor dark and disturbing secrets. As you venture into the depths of the place, you will face a combination of unsettling events, some of mundane origin, such as sudden blackouts, and others, entirely paranormal.

The tension increases with each task and completed night shift, while you face your worst nightmares and an enigmatic mannequin that seems to have a life of its own. Will you be able to maintain your sanity while struggling to survive?

name: Eternal Puppet

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: intel Core i7 4770
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Immerse yourself in a world of psychological horror in ETERNAL PUPPET! Complete the pending tasks and survive the paranormal events in an immersive warehouse. But be careful, you are not alone in the warehouse. Get ready to face your worst fears!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean, Spanish - Latin America, Japanese, Norwegian, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Catalan, Hebrew
*languages with full audio support
